column1: Local Foods////Came in for a quick bite and tried the market veggie sandwich
column2: it was awesome! Now I have two sandwiches that I love from here
column3: and that's only because that is all I have tried so far. Â For the longest time I would order the salmon sandwich
column4: but now I will have to choose which one I want because they are both so good! Inlove the crispness of the ciabatta bread it come on
column5: it's not too soft or too crispy. Flavorful
column7: and crispy are the words that come to my when I take a bite out of this sandwich.
